GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /api/articles/:article_id.description: serves an article corresponding to passed id

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

GET /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: serves all comments corresponding to passed id

comments.body: The owls are not what they seem.
comments.author: icellusedkars

POST /api/articles/:article_id/comments.description: adds a new comment to the db attached with an article by id

comment.body: This is a bad article name
comment.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/:article_id.description: updates article vote count and returns said article
